itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest CBS “Seal Team” actor Justin Melnick to discuss how “Seal Team” has benefitted and represented the veteran community, Justin explains why cops aren’t really set up for success, and he tells the really unique story of how he got onto the show to begin with.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest CBS “Seal Team” actor Justin Melnick to discuss how “Seal Team” has benefitted and represented the veteran community, Justin explains why cops aren’t really set up for success, and he tells the really unique story of how he got onto the show to begin with.
